title: The Best of Forgotten English: A Collection Of Vanishing Vocabulary, Definitions, and Illustrations For Word Lovers
description: For word lovers everwhere! Absorbing, enriching, and often hilarious, this book delves into the wonderful world of archaic words and their definitions. Each word is complimented by an excerpt on how the word was used, a brief description, and a charming illustration that provides a fascinating and often hilarious glimpse into the world of forgotten english.
author: Jeff Kacirk
